import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import tokopedia from '../../../images/website/tokopedia-48.png' import shopee from '../../../images/website/shopee-48.png' import lazada from '../../../images/website/lazada-48.png' const ProductItem = (props) =>{ return(

{props.name}

Stock
{props.stock}
8 variant
) } export default ProductItem;
